title: Ender's Game (2013)
explanation: The plot of "Ender's Game" revolves around a young boy, Ender, who is selected for military training to fight against an alien race that had previously attacked Earth. While the movie does not take place in a post-apocalyptic world, it does center on survival and isolation as Ender must navigate the harsh realities of Battle School and the impending war with the Formics. The themes of isolation and survival are particularly pronounced when Ender is promoted to lead his own squad and is put in increasingly difficult battles, culminating in him commanding the real fleet in the final battle against the Formics.
